the number of bottles that have been loaded into the vat - stored in RFID of cart/vat - read from application_main.log
total amount of material used from a given SLA bottle/cartridge
this is a coarse measurement of the level of material in the vat - used to tell how much resin to pump in

When we install a laser printhead there are different amounts of hours on the laser depending on  manufacturing and testing process,. Warranty hours is essentially zeroing out the hour meter by documenting how many hours were on the laser when it was installed.
